title: Feedeorology
info: This is a recipe app that helps you find a recipe based on the weather!

title: Weather Dashboard
info: This application uses the OpenWeatherMap API find the weather in cities all over the world.

title: Brawndo
info: This app keeps track for you! Making sure your plants stay up to date on waterings so you don't have to have a green thumb to have luscious plants.

title: Day Planner
info: Need to keep track of your fitness and workouts? This is your app!

title: Budget Tracker
info: Need help balancing the budget? Even offline? Budget tracker is there for you.

title: Track A Burger
info: This app keeps track of how many burgers you have and have eaten.
